sentences.en: Ask for refreshment ( unless you are coughing and need a glass of water to recompose yourself ).
sentences.cn: 索要饮料 ( 除非你咳嗽需要一杯水恢复镇静 ).

sentences.en: Flip the camera to vertical, recompose . Shoot again. Same sequence, methodical.
sentences.cn: 把相机竖起来,重新构图, 再拍,同样的场景, 依次拍摄.

sentences.en: The imprecision and recompose of Debussy's script resulted in enormous differences in provenance. "
sentences.cn: 由于德彪西手稿的不精确性和他本人后来的修改 变动,产生了不同出处的谱面差异.

words.tran_cn: 改组；重写；重新安排；使恢复镇静

trans.tran_cn: 将…再次（重新）安排[组成、谱写等]，使恢复平静
